article_title: Recap of the Republicans’ debate on ISIS, immigration and Obamacare
article_text:
Trump’s absence, of course, gives his rivals plenty of fuel to attack him: Texas Sen. Cruz has already suggested Trump would be afraid of Russian President Vladimir Putin if he thinks Fox’s Kelly “is so scary,” and former Florida Gov. Jeb Bush has whacked Trump for “whining.”

Read: How skipping the Republican debate could backfire for Donald Trump.

article_metadata.article.author: Robert Schroeder
article_metadata.description: Follow along with MarketWatch’s Rob Schroeder for a live blog of tonight’s Republican debate.
